text: Châbles (Dictionnaire-Dikchenéro: Français-Patois/Patê-Franché. Société cantonale des patoisans fribourgeois. Fribourg: 2013. p. 98) was a municipality of the district of Broye in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Châbles and Cheyres merged into the new municipality of Cheyres-Châbles.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 29 November 2016 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg
title: Châbles
